com.krobothsoftware.snc.sen.psn.us

Class PlaystationNetworkUs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krobothsoftware.snc.NetworkClient
      • com.krobothsoftware.snc.sen.SonyEntertainmentNetwork
        • com.krobothsoftware.snc.sen.psn.us.PlaystationNetworkUs

  • public class PlaystationNetworkUs
extends SonyEntertainmentNetwork
    Extension PlayStationNetwork client for US website only. Requires SEN-PSN and SNC-EXT-JSON for use.

    There are multiple types of Gamer Profiles but use the same object. Make sure to read documentation on what type of data it holds. If non is specified, all is used.

    Doesn't include games and trophies because they are in SEN-PSN using public methods.

    SEN-PSN silently logs in US account which will make all methods in this client valid for token. Use login(PsnToken, String, String, ProgressListener) to update token. Use isLoginValid(Response) to check if token has expired since all methods here won't throw a Token Exception.

    Since:
    SEN-PSN-US 1.0

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public PsnToken login(String username,
             String password,
             ProgressListener listener)
               throws IOException,
                      ClientLoginException,
                      PlaystationNetworkException
        Performs a full login to US account.

        Connections made 

         https://account.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/external/auth/login!authenticate.action
 https://us.playstation.com/uwps/PSNTicketRetrievalGenericServlet (?sessionId=****)
 http://us.playstation.com/uwps/HandleIFrameRequests (?sessionId=****)
 http://us.playstation.com/uwps/CookieHandler?cookieName=userinfo&id= (random) only if psnId could not be found in ph cookie
 http://searchjid.usa.np.community.playstation.net/basic_view/func/search_jid

        Data retrieved

        • Login cookies
        • Jid
        • SessionId

        Parameters:
        username - email of account
        password - password of account
        listener - monitor progress events. May be null.
        Returns:
        psn login token
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if username or password are null
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientLoginException - if credentials are incorrect
        PlaystationNetworkException - if service is down or login failed
        Since:
        SEN-PSN-US 1.0

      • login

        public void login(PsnToken token,
         String username,
         String password,
         ProgressListener listener)
           throws IOException,
                  ClientLoginException,
                  PlaystationNetworkException
        Performs a re-login for given token; updates token.

        Connections made 

         https://account.sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/external/auth/login!authenticate.action
 https://us.playstation.com/uwps/PSNTicketRetrievalGenericServlet (?sessionId=****)
 http://us.playstation.com/uwps/HandleIFrameRequests (?sessionId=****)

        Data retrieved

        • Updated login cookies
        • New sessionId

        Parameters:
        token - login token to log into again
        username - email of account
        password - password of account
        listener - monitor progress events. May be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if username or password are null
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientLoginException - if credentials are incorrect
        PlaystationNetworkException - if service is down or login failed
        Since:
        SEN-PSN-US 1.0

      • logout

        public void logout(PsnToken token)
            throws IOException
        Logs out of account(token). Clearing cookies in token and and setting SessionId to null is an alternative.

        Connections made 

         http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/logout

        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        Since:
        SEN-PSN-US 1.0

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getUserInfo

        @Beta
public PsnUser getUserInfo(PsnToken token)
                    throws IOException,
                           TokenException
        Retrieves user info from token. userinfo cookie is required in token beforehand which can be retreived with a login.
        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        Returns:
        user info from token
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        TokenException - no userinfo cookie or expired token
        Since:
        SEN-PSN-US 1.0
        Beta:
        request may change in the future

      • getFriendList

        public List<String> getFriendList(PsnToken token)
                           throws IOException,
                                  ClientException
        Retrieves list of friends. Each friend has to be retrieved individually with getGamerProfile(PsnToken, String). The list is sorted from most recent at the top. Even if token expired, it will return an empty list.

        Pending friend requests will be at bottom of list, if there are any. Only way to tell is if friend gamer profile doesn't show up for user.

        Connections made 

         http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profile/friends?lang=en_US&id= (random)

        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        Returns:
        list of friends or empty if user has none
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        Since:
        SEN-PSN-US 1.0

      • getGamerProfile

        public PsnFriendGamerProfile getGamerProfile(PsnToken token,
                                    String psnId)
                                      throws IOException,
                                             ClientException
        Retrieves friend gamer profile for login token and PsnId. Extended version of getGamerProfile(String) for friends.

        Connections made 

         http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profile/get_gamer_summary_data?id= (random)

        Parameters:
        token - psn login token
        psnId - id
        Returns:
        friend gamer profile or null if PsnId was not found
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        Since:
        SEN-PSN-US 1.0

      • getFriendProfileList

        public List<PsnGamerProfile> getFriendProfileList(PsnToken token)
                                           throws IOException,
                                                  ClientException
        Retrieves list of friend profiles. Even if token expired, it will return an empty list.

        WARNING: This method will take approximately 20 seconds to connect and wait for server.

        Connections made 

         http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profile/get_friends_profile_with_trophy_total

        Data retrieved

        Returns:

        Throws:

        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        Since:

      • getSimpleProfile

        public PsnGamerProfile getSimpleProfile(String psnId)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        ClientException
        Retrieves simple gamer profile. Connection time is low. If PsnId is not found, it will return an all zero and null value profile.

        Connections made 

         http://us.playstation.com/playstation/psn/profile/ (psnId) /psnUser?id= (random)

        Data retrieved

        ClientException - if parser encountered an error
        Since:
